text: Jesús Kumate Rodríguez (13 November 1924 - 7 May 2018) was a Mexican physician and politician. He was born in Mazatlán, Sinaloa, Mexico. He served as the Secretary of Health during the Presidency of Carlos Salinas de Gortari from 1988 to 1994. He was awarded Legion of Honour, Chevalier and Officier. His family were immigrants from Japan. Kumate Rodríguez died of respiratory failure in Mexico City on 7 May 2018 at the age of 93.Muere Jesús Kumate, médico pediatra, investigador y exsecretario de Salud ==References== ==Other websites== * Curriculum Vitae – Jesús Kumate Rodríguez Category:1924 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican politicians Category:Mexican physicians
title: Jesús Kumate Rodríguez
